attributes.action: To debate a vote of no confidence in Prime Minister David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: The Cameron Ministry's obsession over the belief that ideology leads to radicalisation is counter to that of experts in the field. (http://tinyurl.com/pe28rsp) The petitioner believes that David Cameron is inflaming public opinion in his crusade to make Britain Christian when the vast majority of Brits do not practice any religion (http://tinyurl.com/pwxthtt) The petitioner urges Parliament to remove David Cameron to make Britain safe for Muslims again. (http://tinyurl.com/oy6gukw)
attributes.background: The PM's rhetoric in describing 'British values' represents a worrying view in which he alone decides who is British and who is not. The petitioner feels that these views are steeped in racism and therefore would petition parliament regardless of party to pass a vote of no confidence in the PM

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
